Key Match Events: The New York Yankees beat the Kansas City Royals 3-1 on Thursday to advance in the MLB playoffs.
Juan Soto, Gleyber Torres, and Giancarlo Stanton drove in runs for the Yankees.
Gerrit Cole surrendered just one run over seven innings.
Kansas City's only run came with two outs in the bottom of the sixth after the benches briefly cleared.
Post-Match Reflections: Yankees slugger Aaron Judge praised Gerrit Cole's performance, stating 'That's why he's our ace. He goes out there and does performances like this when we need him to.'
